channel.title: How to install Flash Player on Ubuntu
channel.description: I googled this and no help. Could somebody make an overly retarded person guide on how to install flash player 9 for ubuntu, i don't want WINE i want Flash Player 9 help. and the plugin can't be found so help please.

item.title: How to install Flash Player on Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:3, topic:183875”][quote author=Divine-Devil link=topic=245126.msg2072886#msg2072886 date=1203821660]

Lol, Try installing X-Chat?.. ‘Sudo apt-get install xchat’ [I Think] Awesome help from them. Basically an IRC client.

that was totally related to this thread

Umm, Maybe I told him to install Xchat was because they help? Instead of posting sarcastic post, like you tend to do.

Just ask them the question. They’d help you ;).

so who is ‘they’?
there are many irc servers and many people, you should know more about what you say before going ahead and posting it

The #Ubuntu channel?..
[/quote]
i suggest you kill yourself cause you sound extremely stupid saying that[/quote]

You said “Who is ‘they’.”

And I said the Ubuntu channel. Meaning the people on there.

How does that sound stupid?

Read full topic
item.source: How to install Flash Player on Ubuntu

item.title: How to install Flash Player on Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

If your running 64bit Ubuntu, you’re out of luck. Your going to have to find the firefox32 script that installs 32bit libs+32bit firefox, then flash player and Java.

Read full topic

item.title: How to install Flash Player on Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Install flashplugin-nonfree from synaptic, or type ‘apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree’ in a terminal and hit enter. That was hard…

Read full topic
